reasoning: Events collected in time periods and merged chronologically

annotated_events.source_text: Apple released Mac OS X Tiger, version 10.4, introducing new features such as Spotlight and Dashboard.
annotated_events.impact: Tiger was well-received and contributed to Apple's growing market share.

annotated_events.source_text: Apple introduced the first iPhone, revolutionizing the smartphone industry.
annotated_events.impact: The iPhone became a huge success and transformed Apple into a major player in the mobile market.

annotated_events.source_text: Apple released Mac OS X Leopard, version 10.5, with features like Time Machine and Spaces.
annotated_events.impact: Leopard received positive reviews and further solidified Apple's reputation for user-friendly software.

annotated_events.source_text: Apple unveiled the first iPad, creating a new category of tablet devices.
annotated_events.impact: The iPad became a best-selling product and influenced the tablet market for years to come.

annotated_events.source_text: Apple releases iOS 5 with features like iMessage and Notification Center.
annotated_events.impact: iOS 5 introduced key features that enhanced user experience and communication on Apple devices.

annotated_events.source_text: Apple unveils the iPhone 4S with Siri voice assistant.
annotated_events.impact: The introduction of Siri marked a significant advancement in smartphone technology.

annotated_events.source_text: Apple introduces the third-generation iPad with Retina display.
annotated_events.impact: The Retina display on the iPad 3 set a new standard for tablet screens.

annotated_events.source_text: Apple launches OS X Mountain Lion with enhanced iCloud integration.
annotated_events.impact: OS X Mountain Lion brought tighter integration between Mac computers and Apple's cloud services.

annotated_events.source_text: Apple unveils the iPhone 5 with a larger screen and Lightning connector.
annotated_events.impact: The iPhone 5's larger screen and Lightning connector represented significant design changes.

annotated_events.source_text: Apple releases iOS 7 with a completely redesigned interface.
annotated_events.impact: iOS 7 introduced a flat design language that influenced app design trends.

annotated_events.source_text: Apple introduces the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus with larger screens.
annotated_events.impact: The larger screens on the iPhone 6 models appealed to users who wanted bigger displays.

annotated_events.source_text: Apple launches the Apple Watch, its first wearable device.
annotated_events.impact: The Apple Watch marked Apple's entry into the wearable technology market.

annotated_events.source_text: Apple releases iOS 9 with multitasking features on iPad and proactive Siri.
annotated_events.impact: iOS 9 introduced productivity enhancements and proactive suggestions to users.

annotated_events.source_text: Apple unveils the iPhone 7 with improved camera and performance.
annotated_events.impact: The iPhone 7 launch generated excitement among consumers and tech enthusiasts.

annotated_events.source_text: Apple releases iOS 10 with new features and enhancements.
annotated_events.impact: iOS 10 introduced significant changes to the user experience and app functionality.

annotated_events.event_name: MacBook Pro with Touch Bar Launch
annotated_events.source_text: Apple unveils the new MacBook Pro with Touch Bar innovation.
annotated_events.impact: The MacBook Pro with Touch Bar received mixed reviews but showcased Apple's design innovation.

annotated_events.source_text: Apple introduces the revolutionary iPhone X with Face ID technology.
annotated_events.impact: The iPhone X launch marked a significant shift in smartphone design and technology.

annotated_events.source_text: Apple releases iOS 11 with new features and improvements.
annotated_events.impact: iOS 11 brought new capabilities to iPhones and iPads, enhancing user productivity.

annotated_events.source_text: Apple officially opens its new headquarters, Apple Park, to employees.
annotated_events.impact: The opening of Apple Park symbolized Apple's commitment to innovation and sustainability.

annotated_events.source_text: Apple unveils the iPhone XS with improved performance and camera capabilities.
annotated_events.impact: The iPhone XS launch continued Apple's tradition of delivering premium smartphones.

annotated_events.source_text: Apple releases macOS Mojave with Dark Mode and new organizational features.
annotated_events.impact: macOS Mojave introduced a visually appealing Dark Mode and enhanced desktop productivity.

annotated_events.source_text: Apple launches the Apple Card, a credit card designed for iPhone users.
annotated_events.impact: The Apple Card launch marked Apple's entry into the financial services industry.

annotated_events.source_text: Apple unveils the iPhone 11 with dual-camera system and A13 Bionic chip.
annotated_events.impact: The iPhone 11 launch showcased Apple's focus on camera technology and performance.

annotated_events.source_text: Apple releases iOS 13 with Dark Mode and performance improvements.
annotated_events.impact: iOS 13 introduced Dark Mode and enhanced privacy features to iPhones and iPads.

annotated_events.event_name: Tim Cook Testifies in Epic Games Trial
annotated_events.source_text: Apple CEO Tim Cook testifies in the Epic Games trial regarding App Store policies.
annotated_events.impact: Tim Cook's testimony in the Epic Games trial sheds light on Apple's App Store practices.

annotated_events.source_text: Apple released iOS 15 with new privacy features and enhancements to FaceTime and Messages.
annotated_events.impact: The release received positive reviews for its user-focused updates and security enhancements.

annotated_events.source_text: The iPhone 13 series was officially launched with new features and improvements.
annotated_events.impact: The launch generated significant market interest and drove sales for Apple.

annotated_events.source_text: Apple unveiled the redesigned MacBook Pro with a new M2 chip and improved display.
annotated_events.impact: The new MacBook Pro design and performance upgrades were well-received by professionals and creatives.

annotated_events.source_text: Apple launched macOS Monterey with new features like Universal Control and Focus mode.
annotated_events.impact: The release was praised for its seamless integration with other Apple devices and productivity enhancements.

annotated_events.source_text: Apple officially announced its plans to enter the electric vehicle market with the Apple Car.
annotated_events.impact: The announcement sparked speculation and excitement in the automotive and tech industries.

annotated_events.source_text: Apple introduced the iPad Pro X with a foldable display and advanced AR capabilities.
annotated_events.impact: The launch of the iPad Pro X set a new standard for tablet innovation and technology.

annotated_events.source_text: Apple rolled out iOS 17 with enhanced AI features and improved Siri integration.
annotated_events.impact: The release of iOS 17 showcased Apple's commitment to AI advancements and user experience.

annotated_events.source_text: Apple announced a major expansion of its original content library on Apple TV+.
annotated_events.impact: The expansion strategy aimed to compete with other streaming services and attract more subscribers.

annotated_events.source_text: Apple's market share in the smartphone industry reached a new high, surpassing competitors.
annotated_events.impact: The increase in market share solidified Apple's position as a leading player in the global smartphone market.
